Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.actions

Class Action

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.actions.Action
Direct Known Subclasses:
AimCardChoiceAction, AimCardInfoAction, AimCardRequestAction, AimCardResultAction, ChangeTurnInfoAction, ChangeTurnRequestAction, ClientDisconnectedAction, CreateRequestAction, DealCardsRequestAction, DealCardsResultAction, DrawAction, EndGameAction, GameIDChoiceAction, GameInitResultAction, HostNameAction, InitializationAction, JoinRequestAction, LastRoundsInfoAction, PlacingAction, PlayersOrderInfoAction, PlayersOrderRequestAction, PositiveDrawAction, PositivePlacingAction, PositiveTokenColorAction, ReadyToPlayAction, RepeatDrawAction, RepeatPlacingAction, StartingCardChoiceAction, StartingCardInfoAction, StartingCardRequestAction, StartingCardResultAction, TokenChoiceAction, TokenInfoAction, TokenRequestAction
public abstract class Action extends Object
Action abstract class defines messages which are used in a listeners-posters system between Model, View and Controller

  • Constructor Details

    • Action

      public Action(String description, String nickname, int gameID, int playerID)
      Constructor for Action
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the action
      nickname - is the name of the Client that triggered this Action
      gameID - is the ID of the party from where the Client that triggered this Action belongs
      playerID - is the ID the Client that triggered this Action
